quotes.content: Family. Religion. Friendship. These are the three demons you must slay if you wish to succeed in business.
Eternal happiness for one dollar? I'd be happier with the dollar.
Well, for once, the rich white man is in control.
Mindless drones! Return to your ugly families!
Listen, Spielbergo, Schindler and I are like peas in a pod! We're both factory owners, we both made shells for the Nazis, but mine worked, damn it!
This anonymous clan of slack-jawed troglodytes has cost me the election, and yet if I were to have them killed, I would be the one to go to jail. That's democracy for you.
I should be able to run over as many kids as I want!
Ooh, the Germans are mad at me. I'm so scared! Ooh, the Germans!
I got so swept up with the notion of being loved I completely forgot who I am. I'm a selfish old crank. And that fits me like a Speedo.
Is it a crime to enjoy nice things, and then steal them from a public museum, where any gum-chewing monkey in a Tufts University jacket can come and gawk at them? I think not!
No, you misunderstand. The picnic is for me. You will all be spending our Day of Independence slaving away at my mansion under the hot summer sun, without pay, water, or gratitude.
I've discovered the perfect business: people swarm in, empty their pockets, and scuttle off. Nothing can stop me now.
Since the beginning of time, man has yearned to destroy the sun. I shall do the next best thing: block it out.
Nonsense! Dogs are idiots. If I came into your house and started sniffing at your crotch and slobbering all over you, what would you say?
I'm looking for something in an attack dog, one who likes the sweet, gamey tang of human flesh. Hmm, why here's the fellow. Wiry, fast, firm proud buttocks... reminds me of me.

All right, you ragtag bunch of misfits! You hate me, and I hate you even more. But without my beloved ringers, you're all I've got. So I want you to remember some inspiring words that someone else might have told you over the course of your lives, and go out there and win!
Look at that pig. Stuffing his face with donuts on my time! That's right, keep eating... Little do you know you're drawing ever closer to the poison donut!
A lifetime of working with nuclear power has left me with a healthy green glow... and left me as impotent as a Nevada boxing commissioner.
Let’s have less conversation and more sanitation.
I’m searching for a suitable young heir to leave my fortune to. My vast, vast, vast, vast fortune.
I will wreak a terrible vengeance on this city. No one will be spared. NO ONE.
Let the fools have their automobiles, I say!
Oh, so mother nature needs a favor? Well, maybe she should have thought of that when she was besetting us with droughts and floods.
By building a casino, I could tighten my stranglehold on this dismal town.
Tell you what; if we come back and everyone's slaughtered, I'll owe you a coke.
Anyone can start a family. These days no one can find a job.
And just so you know, Svetlana will do anything for you. Anything except sex. And I do mean anything.
Whoa, slow down there maestro. There's a NEW Mexico?
There's a little crippled boy sitting in a hospital who wants you to win this game. I know because I crippled him myself to inspire you.
Who could forget such a monstrous visage? She has the sloping brow and cranial bumpage of the career criminal.
So, you're a baby, huh? How's that working out for you?
Ah, fresh victims for my ever-growing army of the undead.
The foul stench of youth...
Compadres, it is imperative that we crush the freedom fighters before the start of the rainy season. And remember, a shiny new donkey for whomever brings me the head of Colonel Montoya.
I ought to club them and eat their bones!
A few more details about the company picnic - it's at the plant, no food will be served, the only activity will be work, and the picnic is canceled.

If you can take advantage of a situation in some way, it's your duty as an American to do it. Why should the race always be to the swift, or the Jumble to the quick-witted? Should they be allowed to win merely because of the gifts God gave them? Well I say, Cheating is the gift man gives himself.
